```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(teachr)
library(tidyverse)
knitr::knit_hooks$set(class = function(before, options, envir) {
  if(before) {
    sprintf("<div class='%s'>", options$class)
  } else {
    "</div>"
  }
})
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.retina = 2,
                      fig.width = 6, 
                      fig.height = 4,
                      fig.align = "center",
                      cache = TRUE,
                      cache.path = "cache/",
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE)
```
